root.name: NyxQuest: Kindred Spirits
root.description: IntroductionNyxQuest: Kindred Spirits is a 2.5D platformer for Nintendo's Wiiware service, PC/Mac and iOS by the Spanish studio Over the top Games. The player controls Nyx, an angel who descends from the heavens to find her friend Icarus, with the help of the gods. The game has a two player mode in which one controls Nyx and the other the power of the gods.GameplayIn NyxQuest you will have the ability to use the power of the different gods from Greek mythology. Zeus for instance will grant you the power of lightning that you use by pointing the IR Pointer of the Wii-Remote at where you want to shoot. Other gods will let you control the wind allowing the player to fly to further away location that the player may not have been able to reach before, this is done by flicking the Wii-remote in the direction you want the wind to blow.
